title: Is there something like follow-fork-mode for gdbserver?
content:
My question is quite straight forward: is there a possibility to tell gdbserver to follow the child when forking like 
set follow-fork-mode child

answers_data.content:
Unfortunately, it seems to be not supported (a bug?). See this bug report in 
gdb
bugzilla. I am not aware of any recent update concerning this bug...

comments.text: So, is there any chance to do usable remote debugging with IDA? :-)
If the bug is fixed one day, it will be perfectly usable. But, waiting for this, it's quite doubtful. Anyway, posting your question here can put some more pressure on the gdb dev team ! ;-)
I agree with @Devolus ! Go, go, go ! :)
I didn't try, but the last comments in the bug report claim that this was fixed in 2015.
